# PLSFIX-THX

> Give your AI agent perfect context. A free Chrome extension for screenshot annotation.

## What is PLSFIX-THX?

PLSFIX-THX is a Chrome extension that helps developers communicate with AI tools like ChatGPT, Claude, Cursor, and Windsurf. Capture any screen, add numbered annotations pointing to exact locations, and export AI-ready images in seconds.

## Key Features

- One-click screenshot capture (area or full page)
- Numbered annotations with text notes
- Drag-and-drop annotation positioning
- Export to PNG, PDF, and HTML
- 100% local processing — no images uploaded to servers
- Works with any AI tool that accepts images

## How It Works

1. Press Alt+Shift+S to capture an area (or Alt+Shift+F for full page)
2. Click on the image to add numbered annotations with notes
3. Export and paste into your AI tool
4. Say "fix #1" or "change #2 to blue" — your AI sees exactly what you mean

## Pricing
